title: LoL on Mac, "file may be damaged" error with OS Sierra
body: Ever since upgrading to latest Mac OS Sierra i get this error and need to reinstall almost every time i close Beta Client. This is basically unplayable since it takes a couple hours to uninstall/reinstall every time. Any help / tips would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: Which specific build of Sierra are you using? Is it 10.12.2 Beta or 10.12.1? Also, do you use Time Machine to back up your mac? If so, I'd recommend rolling back to the previous version of macOS using [this guide](https://support.apple.com/kb/PH18846?locale=en_US).
